connections.description: ItAnt: Tipasa colonia m.p. XVI Casae Calventi

references.formattedCitation: Cuntz, Otto, ed. Itineraria Antonini Augusti et Burdigalense. Itineraria Romana 1. Leipzig: Teubner, 1929. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/936644063.

connections.title: Casae Calventi?

description: Tipasa was an ancient Punic trading-post conquered by Rome and turned into a strategic base for the conquest of the kingdoms of Mauritania.

history.comment: Location updates and tags from Johan Ahlfeldt's (jahlfeldt) Digital Atlas of the Roman Empire in October 2012
